resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Offline routing in our maps (you need the 'BRouter' app on your device)
 · New: Support ignoring caches on OpenCaching sites
 · New: Remove duplicate caches from all other lists
 · New: Undo ability for clear log menu item
 · New: Filter for found caches missing a voting
 · Fix: Better clipboard format when copying waypoint coordinates
 · Fix: Wrong icon when navigating to a waypoint
 · Fix: Detect wherigo cartridge links in short description
 · Change: Fetch more caches from OC sites when GC is disabled in settings
 · Removed: No longer supports captchas for getting exact coordinates as basic member
